link.title: Scraperbox
link.description: Undetectable Web Scraping API. Scrape web pages without getting blocked.

link.title: Smashing Magazine
link.description: Founded in September 2006 in Germany, Smashing Magazine delivers reliable, useful, but most importantly practical articles to web designers and developers. We don’t care about trends; we care about things that work or fail in actual projects. We are — and always have been — independent. 14+ years, and still ongoing.
